div.head: 惡蛇虺傷
div.div: injury caused by the venom of a malign snake

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: injury caused by the venom of a malign snake

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with she hui shang 蛇虺傷 , harm caused by a venomous snake. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mu xiang 木香 quotes Xiu zhen fang 袖珍方 : 惡蛇虺傷：青木香不拘多少，煎水 服，效不可述 , “For injury caused by the venom of a malign snake : boil any amount of qing mu xiang in water and ingest. The effects are undescribable”.
